parameters.name: color `String`
parameters.description: The color in any of the following formats.| Format         | Description| ---            | --- | ---| red            | [Basic](http://www.w3.org/TR/css3-color/#html4) or [Extended](http://www.w3.org/TR/css3-color/#svg-color) CSS Color name| #ff0000        | Hex RGB value| rgb(255, 0, 0) | RGB valueSpecifying 'none', 'transparent' or '' (empty string) will clear the fill.
